directions: Toss tomatoes, bell pepper, onion, and garlic with oil in a shallow (1-inch-deep) baking pan and broil about 4 inches from heat, turning occasionally, until lightly charred on all sides, about 10 minutes. Cool 10 minutes.
Peel garlic and purée in a blender with roasted vegetables, lemon juice, red pepper flakes, and salt until smooth.
ingredients: 1 red bell pepper, quartered lengthwise and stemmed
1/4 teaspoon dried hot red pepper flakes
title: Roasted Tomato and Bell Pepper Salsa
